title: kaNamEnum
sahitya:
kaNamEnum iniyEnum kaLaippAruvAi kAlamellAm anbarkku aruL shErkkum paramA nI


anupallavi

  iNai piriyAk-kamala malarannai tannODu EkAntamAga en idayAmbujam tannil


caraNam    shoriyum kaNNIrAl unnai nIrATTuvEn parindu pAl pazham tandu pashiyATruvEn
 kanivODu kazhal piDittuk-kaLippUTTuvEn paNNishaittun pugazh pADit-tuyilUTTuvEn
